Text: I want to personally thank you for the advise concerning security.  I have been pirating since Napster started and never had a problem.  I have been away for over and year of the Bay and such and got sloppy.  The same night I read your note I got a letter from my ISP busting me.  It will not happen again.  TKS Mucho

Thanks for the tip Grey Shadow!!!!!
Thanks for the movie!!!!!
